name: f5anything
description: Put any terminal command in a launch.json to run it with F5.

command.description: The terminal command to run when this configuration runs.
command.default: echo Change this echo to your custom command

terminalIndex.description: The 0-based index of the terminal in the VSCode terminal list to send commands to. Uses own terminal if out of range or -1 (default). Terminals are indexed in order of creation, not by visual order.

showTerminal.description: Whether or not to switch to the terminal F5 Anything just sent a command to. Defaults to true.

initialConfigurations.name: F5 Anything: Custom Command
initialConfigurations.command: echo CHANGE THIS ECHO TO YOUR COMMAND

configurationSnippets.label: F5 Anything: New Custom Command
configurationSnippets.description: A new configuration for running a custom terminal command.

body.name: F5 Anything: Custom Command
body.command: echo CHANGE THIS ECHO TO YOUR COMMAND
